segments.text: How can I help you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to sign up for some funds units . How do I go about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you got some ID and your cash card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I've already got a fund account with you too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many more fund units would you like to purchase today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not quite sure . You see , I already have more than 5,000 RIB in my cash card , but I really don't know how much I should get .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The usual minimum purchase is 5,000 RIB .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That settles it then . 5,000 RIB it is , thanks .
segments.speaker: S2
